name: vaisala_project_prototype
description: Basic idea of this project is monitor temperature in 2 different places inside apartment.  - Express server is programmed on laptop and then deployed on Heroku  - Temperature  will be measured by DHT11 and KY-028 sensors. After that, data will be sent to Express server - Sending data is done by using POST request (or maybe other approaches). A simple front-end website will be designed to display these data
